title: Worst Hextech Chests ever?
body:
I own all the champs (including Ivern), as a quick note.

I bought an 11 chest bundle...

8 champ shards.
2 ward skin shards.
1 skin shard. (Fifth Age Taric, which I already own due to a prior reroll.)

Why Rito, why? {{summoner:3}} 

--

p.s What can I do with more champ shards than I could possibly need?

replies.body: Trust me, it happens, but it won't affect you too much, i'm sitting on 20 champ shards personally, and you slowly whittle them down through Champion mastery and new champions (i used to have 25 like 2 champs ago.)
Honestly champion shards are really good if you own all the champions IMO. When a new champion is released you can simply re-roll 3 champion shards to get the new champion 100% of the time.

THIS IS COMPLETE BULL SH IT!

PROOF?
You can, i have been doing this since hextech chests were released.

REKT! 

YOU GOT TROLLED BY RIOT HAHAHAHA!
spending money on hextech crafting. you got what you deserved
